Description: Everki Beacon Laptop Backpack With Gaming Console Sleeve, Fits Up To 18' (EKP117NBKCT) The ultrasoft, padded Everki Beacon Laptop Backpack (EKP117NBKCT) protects and carries laptops up to 18-inches and still has enough room for a gaming console and accessories. This 18' laptop backpack features a five point balance strap system, an aero-flow padded back, and a shoulder harness. The main storage compartment has a large zippered pocket, dividers, and an assortment of multifunctional accessory slots for storing various gadgets. A buckle system allows the compartment to open halfway for quick access or a full 180 degrees for easy loading. Gamers will appreciate the inclusion of a dedicated sleeve for taking a gaming console (XBox360, PS3, or Wii) on the go. This Gaming Laptop Backpack with Console Sleeve also has dual hip pockets and a zippered outer pocket and slot to provide extra storage and quick access to important items. The Everki Beacon Laptop Backpack (EKP117NBKCT) has an integrated stowaway, water-resistant weather cover for use in snow, rain, or dust.
